description: Periods for game of Third One Lucky.
references: E. R. Berlekamp, J. H. Conway and R. K. Guy, Winning Ways, Academic Press, NY, 2 vols., 1982, see p. 487.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: Inserted 16 between the current 16th and 17th entry. This is an error in Winning Ways. I thank Emilie Hogan, my graduate student, for pointing this out. - _Doron Zeilberger_, Dec 09 2008
